name: Euphoria
description:
"BLOOM"

season II

"
On that moment
on that one instant second
the heart expanded, expanded so largely it burst
jumped so high that it fly

and on that one instant second
the whole world surrounds you
yes, you
yet you knew,
you're now larger than all that is true
"

EUPHORIA

_koda, 2021


-
animated by Hand using digital painting.
